issue.title: qa: Data race detected when running `mempool_expiry.py`
issue.body:
https://cirrus-ci.com/task/4919890316361728?command=ci#L3486 Similar issues: - #19211 - #19417

events.body: The issue is reproducible locally on Linux Mint 20 (x86_64).
In the meantime (before fixing the bug) a suppression can be added

rename.from: test: Data race detected when running mempool_expiry.py
rename.to: qa: Data race detected when running mempool_expiry.py

rename.from: qa: Data race detected when running mempool_expiry.py
rename.to: qa: Data race detected when running `mempool_expiry.py`

events.body:
Does it makes sense to keep this open any longer given #20276?
Otherwise, what is there actual actionable todo here? Does the original problem still occur with master?
